title: 08/17/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/17/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to Tim Tebow getting cut by the Jaguars and why it was obvious from the beginning he was never going to make a NFL roster. He tells you which NFL team has the worst QB situation right now as we get closer to the start of the regular season. He points out a NBA team that needs to accept it's time to break up their young stars and start over. Plus, Hall of Famer Edgerrin James joins the show to talk about playing for Tony Dungy and alongside Peyton Manning.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
